title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API; pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, NextChat frontend, embeddings, etc.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for easy containerized deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code or chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI micro-service exposing Ollama endpoints with OpenAI-compatible chat API.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that replies using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.
